content.raw:
The ```manage()``` function in which this plugin would run is run in a thread you might want to wrap all your Qt calls in  ```inmain()``` or add some inmain decorators.
Also you might want to change the Qt imports to qtutils 2 or remove them I don't see why you would need them.
content.html: The manage() function in which this plugin would run is run in a thread you might want to wrap all your Qt calls in inmain() or add some inmain decorators. Also you might want to change the Qt imports to qtutils 2 or remove them I don't see why you would need them.
